MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH26 postcode area of Penicuik. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.30PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of damaged electrical equipment on our underground cable network on Carlops Road. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.11AM on 14th October 2020.
